title: Featured NASA Resource: Mars Perseverance Rover
description: Explore the latest discoveries and images from NASA's Perseverance rover as it searches for signs of ancient life on Mars. This collection includes high-resolution images, 3D models, and scientific data from the Jezero Crater exploration.
creator: NASA/JPL-Caltech
description_508: NASA's Perseverance rover captured this stunning view of the Martian landscape in Jezero Crater.
keywords_string: Mars, Perseverance Rover, Jezero Crater, Mars 2020, Space Exploration, NASA, Planetary Science
